fixes.name: Median Sales Price National
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau MEDIAN([Price]) to DAX MEDIAN('trulia_dataset_cleaned (trulia_dataset_cleanedTBL)'[Price]). MEDIAN is an aggregation over the Price column, so it is implemented as a measure.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (MEDIAN), so it should be created as a measure.
